sentences.sContent: The objective would be to recycle 98 percent of domestic waste.
sentences.sCn: 该目标是循环使用98%的生活垃圾。

remMethod.val: re(重新)+cycle(循环)→重新循环→回收利用， 再应用

words.tran: 可回收利用的；可再循环的
回收；再循环利用（recycle的现在分词）

trans.tranOther: If you recycle things that have already been used, such as bottles or sheets of paper, you process them so that they can be used again
